documents.document: @SiobhanLambe 💗I know you understand the feel and I'm glad you have a cute guy to take care of you too.
Being hugged and told that I'm loved and that I have someone here for me no matter what when I'm sick is the absolute best thing.
Honestly, I'd be better off without the entirety of my gastrointestinal system. It's a bitch.
@JordanAntonWind Not yet! I'll probably watch it in the morning.
Petition for @edsheeran and @passengermusic to tour together again and just play all the songs together.
Me: *just trying to be productive and work* My brain suddenly: Uh huh, this my shit, all the girls stomp your feet like this, few times I--
@JordanAntonWind That's awesome! Man this season of RWBY has been so good too.
@JordanAntonWind Ahhh that makes more sense. I'll have to watch episode 2 soon.
@JordanAntonWind Ethel? In what? Because all I can think of is I Love Lucy lol
@JordanAntonWind Yup! I really enjoyed it. What did you think?
Ahh, my town once it snows a little. https://t.co/AA6BMb1kSD
@LaurenArleene Ugh and in the dream I also had a golden retriever and I got to punch my ex in the face. Why did I have to wake up?
Frick. I was having a dream about it being sunny and me being on the beach with my friends and then I wake up to snow. What the heck???
Great thread about why the movie Split is ableist and demonizes dissociative identity disorder. https://t.co/SJZpyfxGjn
@ChelseaMayday Lol probably. I just don't want it to be like Grey's Anatomy where they're going into like season 12 or whatever and its shit
@ChelseaMayday Same. I mean honestly if they ended it well I'd be okay with this being the last just because idk what else there is to do.
@ChelseaMayday Same! Everyone needs to pair off and live happily ever after. That happens in this type of murder drama right? 😬
@ChelseaMayday I want them to get back together and then get as far away from Annalise as possible tbh
@ChelseaMayday I want redemption and a beard for Frank and that's really not too much to ask for lol (Also Connor and Oliver together)
@ChelseaMayday And he's cute, but damn I miss his beard! It suited him so much.
@ChelseaMayday I feel like they won't. Honestly I'm not sure where the show will go after this season.
@SiobhanLambe No problem, and good luck! I always get so bitchy when I can't have food.
@ChelseaMayday Ugh right? But I feel like she will out of his memory or whatever.
@SiobhanLambe Jeez that's the worst. Maybe a slurpee, but in a flavour that's not red or purple?
@ChelseaMayday Yeah, I feel like he's definitely doing it to try to make up for stuff. But I don't think anything will be the same again.
@SiobhanLambe Apple juice and popsicles. So many popsicles.
He's not! I think it was Nate #HTGAWM https://t.co/1AND7wKdSR
I just tried to plug my phone charger into my tea cup. Brain fog is so fun 😬
Practiced some self care by exfoliating my face, but like, how do I exfoliate my entire existence?
Dude from the Telus company came to my door about the installation yesterday and he looked like Aaron Ekblad. I am shook.
Oh shit, and now I'm looking at old photos. Look at the difference between me in 2009 and now! https://t.co/kGsZwOfXY7
Oh jeez, this was in my on this day and look at me from 7 years ago! I had such long hair and such a baby face wow. https://t.co/JH4bWSsBkP
Who do I have to bribe to get a Captain America and the Howling Commandos movie?
Felt god awful, napped for 2 hours and now I feel so much worse. Ugh. What is today??? There's nothing overtly wrong, but I feel horrible.
@JordanAntonWind Oh my god. Still always gonna be one of my favourite episodes.
I'm just wearing jean shorts and a sweater with nothing under it because that's all I could grab quickly with them knocking at the door.
I don't even WANT Telus fibre optic, and yet, here I am.
When the installation people say they'll be here between 10 and 12, but show up at 9:30 while you're naked and still wet from showering 🙃😑🙃
@ChelseaMayday Oh my god 😂 I mean I do love Halloween
My fatigue has been so bad lately. I keep forgetting things and completely zoning out. It's so damn frustrating.
I saw a photo on tumblr that made me think of this photo of him. Damn he was cute. https://t.co/9sqLCoqqBL
Doesn't matter how long it's been, sometimes I still get reminded of Marvin and cry. I miss him so damn much.
I'm rewatching The Winter Soldier for the millionth time and I'm never gonna get over how badass Anthony Mackie is as The Falcon.
The NHL All Star game has given me PK Subban hugging Connor McDavid into submission and I feel so blessed.
I walk a fine line between wanting to tell people off and being raised to always take the high road.
I'm a little stressed though because I don't want our landlords to think we're shit tenants and kick us out after our lease.
The only even remotely loud thing I can think of is our washing machine, but like? All of the apartments have them and I need to do laundry?
Wooooow. So apparently there's been a noise complaint about us from the apartment beneath us.
I wish I didn't have to pay for a day out by feeling sick and exhausted the next day. I wish I didnt have to miss things I looked forward to
It's never going to not be frustrating when my body and my health fail me.
@JordanAntonWind How so? I really don't mind spoilers.
@JordanAntonWind No, I don't get it on Tv. But was it good? I'm debating whether I'm going to bother continuing.
I'm down with this. #pisces https://t.co/A9H21n7ZXA
@MagnumP2 See that's when I would definitely put it on a plate then because what's the point if you can't mix it right?
@MagnumP2 Actually no! Thankfully the smell has stayed out in the hallway, so it's fine with the door closed.
@MagnumP2 Depends on the food. I'll eat Chinese out of the container, but if I get pizza I'll usually use a plate.… https://t.co/I7aAsxl3KX
The whole floor of my apartment building smells heavily of fish for the second time this week and I would really love for that to stop.
AHHH my bro is having a lil baby boy! (I totally called it). Still gonna nickname him after vegetables and fruits though.
@ChelseaMayday I definitely will. We're strong as hell and we've got this even if it gets us down sometimes.
@ChelseaMayday Thanks girl 💕 It's one of those dumb things like when you get anxiety over something you KNOW is dum… https://t.co/PPA86qPbn4
@ChelseaMayday Yeah I'm alright. As much as I try not to think about the past, it just messes me up sometimes.
@SiobhanLambe Ugh it's the worst. This is not how I wanted the caffeine to effect me. Now I'm just chugging water hoping it stops 😬
I had coffee and it didn't wake me up, but it did make my heart race so now I'm exhausted and weirdly out of breath 🙃
It's sucks because even though I have amazing friends and I'm in a loving relationship, I low key feel unloveable and ugly sometimes 😬
That same person also telling you that multiple people have called you ugly also fucks you up pretty bad.
Let me tell you, dating a person for 2 years who then tells you that you're impossible to love really fucks you up.
I haven't stopped calling my friend's baby by veggie names since I found out she was pregnant and it isn't gonna st… https://t.co/izggGNqQx6
@SiobhanLambe Thanks! Same goes for you. You're very resilient and it's amazing. #BellLetsTalk
@caitalytic Love you! I appreciate that so much ❤ #BellLetsTalk
We need so badly to dispel the shame that comes with talking about mental illnesses. It's not shameful to ask for help. #BellLetsTalk
#BellLetsTalk because I feel fine telling anyone about my Crohn's, but almost no one knows I've been suicidal.
I've suffered with depression and anxiety off and on, mostly due to my medical conditions. #BellLetsTalk https://t.co/iElEYaj1hr
Dr. Victor "I haven't been in the main storyline all season, but I'm here now guys" Frankenstein is a true friend. #PennyDreadful
Reminder because I did not think about this and was still following. https://t.co/1mIMrDzJJi
Can we just appreciate the selfie lighting in my apartment and also how cute I look with pierced ears? https://t.co/liB2b3HgwF
@ChelseaMayday Sounds like a solid plan. And definitely let's! Just let me know when works for you.
@ChelseaMayday I just hope you find something that works for you 💕
@ChelseaMayday That makes sense, stress can do some awful shit. And you're right, at least it's one thing you know for sure it's not.
@ChelseaMayday Wow I'm really sorry they came back totally fine. It's the worst when you know something is wrong but can't figure out what.
Got this in the mail today and I can't wait to try it on later oh my gosh https://t.co/NuQHiFvck5
@JordanAntonWind Heck yes! That's so awesome that we're not going to have to wait too long.
Okay. So I just finished watching The OA and it was one of the most intriguing things I've seen in ages. Can there be more please? #TheOA
Date night walking through the lights at Lafarge Lake. https://t.co/RNuI2LzXFK
@LEGargiulo @KitWatson Love you twin 💗
@ChelseaMayday I guess that makes sense. You'd just think they'd pinpoint their locations better.
@ChelseaMayday I used to get that visiting a friend in Chilliwack, it would say I had entered the US. Like no???
Trying to dress to go out in the cold when I can't wear jeans is the most stressful thing.
TBH I was quite disappointed to wake up and not have this new friend. Where are you???
I had a dream last night that I made friends with this really sarcastic dude and we bonded over loving Chris Evans.
@JordanAntonWind Who do you think killed her? And also, that isn't actually the overarching murder for the season.
@JordanAntonWind Fair. I didn't when I watched it.
@JordanAntonWind ooh what did you think?
@JordanAntonWind Right? But I think she needed someone to kind of bully her into doing something about it.
@JordanAntonWind I hadn't noticed that, but that's really cool. I'm also glad that Yang is recovering.
@JordanAntonWind It definitely has! And damn I can't wait to see what happens with Weiss because the thing she summoned looked badass.
@JordanAntonWind Yeah! I caught up to episode 9. I wasn't sure, is that the end or how many will there be?
I hate very few people and sometimes I wonder if those few know how much I actually hate them.
@kssimsthrives Sorry to hear that! It's awful that it's always seems that way when it comes to illnesses, but I lov… https://t.co/jSgY8uTRgA
I would love to not be bitter, but man, I am SO bitter.
Me when I realize I can't do something because of my chronic illness. #spoonieproblems https://t.co/3VP6jrtteY
